snippet.title: Castlevania Part 1 2004 - Java (176p)
snippet.description:
Running on Kemulator - 176x176 version

the same game from 128x128 res version
but here all the visuals fits what we expect 
from mobile games from those years

"Castlevania Part 1" or just Castlevania 2004

only stage 01 and 02 (
First and fourth stages ported from Sharp X68000 version (Chronicles on PS1)

since shareware was already uncommon in the 2000's
i don't believe that it was some sort of download content
for the extra stages, and both versions lack them

the 2008 version comes as a complete game standalone

By Konami Mobile - 2004

~~~~~~~~~~

Edit: @st1ka make an amazing video presenting 
obscure castlevania ports and a lot of mobile stuff
one other the thing interesting there is a small part of this version on further stages, 
so i guess there is more sax for me to listen to

#castlevania #java #mobilegames
#rudolphmaia #revivalhorror #j2me
